itemInfo.itemDesc:
A fresh salad made with quality mushrooms and seafood. 

- Unique Effect: Weight Limit +30LT 45 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Dressing
item.desc:
A sauce with soft flavor and texture.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Seafood Mushroom Salad, Fish Filet Salad, etc.

item.name: Squid
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Seafood Pasta, Stir Fried Seafood, Seafood Mushroom Salad, etc.

item.name: Fortune Teller Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Ehwaz Hill and Coastal Cliff. Fortune Teller Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Sky Mushroom
item.desc: A natural resource that can be used as an element for cooking, alchemy.\n - How to Obtain : Elric Shrine, from Sky Mushroom.\n ※ Direct use of this item will give you special buff but it might cause food poisoning at the same time!

item.name: Truffle Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking. Truffle Mushroom require a certain level of skill to collect.
- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Truffle Mushrooms using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!
